measure.name: set_residential_window_skylight_area
measure.description: Sets the window/skylight area for the building. Doors with glazing should be set as window area. Also, sets presence/dimensions of overhangs for windows on the specified building facade(s). See https://github.com/NREL/resstock#workflows for supported workflows using this measure.
measure.modeler_description: Automatically creates and positions standard residential windows/skylights based on the specified window/skylight area on each building facade. Windows are only added to surfaces between finished space and outside. Any existing windows are removed. Also, creates overhang shading surfaces for windows on the specified building facade(s) and specified depth/offset. Any existing overhang shading surfaces are removed.

argument.name: front_wwr
argument.description: The ratio of window area to wall area for the building's front facade. Enter 0 if specifying Front Window Area instead.

argument.name: back_wwr
argument.description: The ratio of window area to wall area for the building's back facade. Enter 0 if specifying Back Window Area instead.

argument.name: left_wwr
argument.description: The ratio of window area to wall area for the building's left facade. Enter 0 if specifying Left Window Area instead.

argument.name: right_wwr
argument.description: The ratio of window area to wall area for the building's right facade. Enter 0 if specifying Right Window Area instead.

argument.name: front_window_area
argument.description: The amount of window area on the building's front facade. Enter 0 if specifying Front Window-to-Wall Ratio instead.

argument.name: back_window_area
argument.description: The amount of window area on the building's back facade. Enter 0 if specifying Back Window-to-Wall Ratio instead.

argument.name: left_window_area
argument.description: The amount of window area on the building's left facade. Enter 0 if specifying Left Window-to-Wall Ratio instead.

argument.name: right_window_area
argument.description: The amount of window area on the building's right facade. Enter 0 if specifying Right Window-to-Wall Ratio instead.

argument.name: window_aspect_ratio
argument.description: Ratio of window height to width.

argument.name: overhang_depth
argument.description: Depth of the overhang. The distance from the wall surface in the direction normal to the wall surface.

argument.name: overhang_offset
argument.description: Height of the overhangs above windows, relative to the top of the window framing.

argument.name: overhang_front_facade
argument.description: Overhangs: Specifies the presence of overhangs for windows on the front facade.

argument.name: overhang_back_facade
argument.description: Overhangs: Specifies the presence of overhangs for windows on the back facade.

argument.name: overhang_left_facade
argument.description: Overhangs: Specifies the presence of overhangs for windows on the left facade.

argument.name: overhang_right_facade
argument.description: Overhangs: Specifies the presence of overhangs for windows on the right facade.

argument.name: front_skylight_area
argument.description: The amount of skylight area on the building's front finished roof facade.

argument.name: back_skylight_area
argument.description: The amount of skylight area on the building's back finished roof facade.

argument.name: left_skylight_area
argument.description: The amount of skylight area on the building's left finished roof facade.

argument.name: right_skylight_area
argument.description: The amount of skylight area on the building's right finished roof facade.
